metadata.title: Can anyone have CC Compiler for RH850 on e2 Studio IDE?

sections.content:
Question:
Can anyone have CC Compiler for RH850 on e2 Studio IDE?
Answer:
The Renesas CC-RH compiler is only supported by the CS+ IDE and not by e2 studio.
Suitable Products
RH850/F1x
